DOC.brief_title: Fluoxetine v Aripiprazole Comparative Trial ( FACT )
DOC.detailed_description: To Compare Fluoxetine Aripiprazole All-cause Discontinuation/Need Add Another Psychiatric Medication , Symptomatic Improvement , Adverse Effects
DOC.criteria: consent obtain patient parent ( assent patient 18 ) ; age 1225 year ( inclusive ) ; Englishspeaking ; least one positive ( Scale A ) SOPS score 35 , i.e. , moderate , moderately severe severe . lifetime diagnosis Axis I psychotic disorder , include : schizophreniform disorder , schizophrenia , schizoaffective disorder , bipolar disorder , major depression psychotic feature ; current psychosis ( positive symptom SOPS score 6 , i.e. , extreme ) ; current diagnosis Major Depressive Disorder , single episode recurrent , severe without psychotic feature ; current stimulant treatment ; history neurological , neuroendocrine medical condition know affect brain ; significant medical condition contraindicate treatment either aripiprazole fluoxetine ; past current substance dependence ; sunstance abuse within last 4 week ; IQ < 70 .
